label: Driving Water
description: Water is not only used to power engines. Woodcutting speed will increase by +10% for every 150 units of water used in Rain Engines.

label: Ancient Strength
description: Stone tablets reveal the secrets of the ancients' strength. Scouts can carry +4 additional items and move 7% faster for every 2 <sprite name="[valuable] ancient tablet"> Ancient Tablet in the settlement's Warehouses.

label: Reconnaissance
description: Scout working speed on Dangerous and Forbidden Glade Events is increased by 50% for 180 seconds due to a recently discovered small glade (source: Farsight).

label: Farsight
description: Scouting ahead makes it easier to prepare for the worst. Discovering a small glade increases the working speed of scouts investigating Dangerous or Forbidden Glade Events by 50% for 180 seconds.

label: Prayer Book
description: Scouts work 10% faster on Glade Events for every firekeeper assigned to a Hearth.

label: Carved in Stone
description: Secret methods of dealing with threats are engraved in Ancient Tablets. Scouts work 10% faster on Glade Events for every 2 Reputation Points gained from completed Glade Events. (the bonus is added retroactively)

label: Violent Dusk
description: Villagers get a -4 penalty to their Resolve for each Hostility level. (Permanent. Won't be removed once the corresponding Glade Event is finished.)

label: Growing Darkness
description: Villagers get a -4 penalty to their Resolve for each Hostility level. (Is active only when the corresponding Glade Event is being worked on)

label: Growing Darkness
description: Villagers get a -4 penalty to their Resolve for each Hostility level. (Permanent. Won't be removed once the corresponding Glade Event is finished.)

label: Violent Dusk
description: With its giant wings, the Stormbird can bring even more stormy clouds over the settlement. Villagers get a -4 penalty to their Resolve during each storm. Multiplies with Hostility level. (Permanent. Won't be removed once the corresponding Glade Event is finished.)

label: Woodpecker Technique
description: Gain 5 <sprite name="[food raw] insects"> Insects every time woodcutters cut down a tree during the Storm.

label: Improvised Tools (Stormforged)
description: Woodcutters are tasked with creating makeshift tools. Discovering a glade during the Storm grants 15 <sprite name="[tools] simple tools"> Tools.

label: Gift of the Depths
description: After using bait 150 times in your fishing huts, you will unlock the ability to sacrifice <sprite name="[mat raw] algae"> algae in the Ancient Hearth to reduce Hostility.

label: Inspiring Pressure
description: The forest is as scary as it is beautiful. Villagers have a 3% higher chance of producing double yields for each Hostility level.

label: Gathering Knowledge
description: The Marshlands are a gatherer's paradise. Gathering speed is increased by 10% for every 2 workers assigned to gathering camps. Bonus does not affect the Woodcutters' Camp.

label: Song of Haste
description: An energetic, inspiring melody. Global production rate is +50% faster for the duration of this season.

label: Miracle of Strength
description: A powerful connection between the settlement's Hearth and the Citadel. The Ancient Hearth's resistance to corruption is increased by 250 for the duration of this season.

label: Chest of Farming Tools
description: A special delivery from the First Dawn Company. All buildings using fertile soil produce +50% more goods. This effect lasts 3 seasons (including the current season) and must be active during planting to affect harvested crops.

label: Miracle of Peace
description: A sign from the Queen herself. Hostility is decreased by 100 for the duration of this season.

label: Miracle of Agility
description: Looking in the direction of the Citadel, one can see a hopeful glow on the horizon. Scouts work 50% faster on Glade Events for the duration of this season.

label: Song of Hope
description: A peaceful song of hope. Villagers with low Resolve will leave the town 50% slower for the duration of this season.

label: Song of Prosperity
description: The clang of a golden bell. All trade routes are 100% faster for the duration of this season.

label: Royal Tax
description: The Crown requires you to contribute to the Royal Treasury. At the end of each Drizzle season, you will be asked to pay 1 <sprite name="[valuable] amber"> Amber for every 3 villagers in your settlement. If you don't, 2 people will leave.

label: Gathering Storm

label: Guild's Disfavor

label: Ominous Presence

label: Unyielding Corruption

label: Unyielding Corruption
description: The next newcomer group from the Citadel will arrive 33% slower because of a missed payment (source: Shifting Paths). This effect will disappear after accepting a newcomer group.

label: Lost Newcomers
description: If you don't deliver the required goods, the next newcomer group from the Citadel will arrive 33% slower.

label: Manned Lookout

label: Cloaked Wanderer's Vengeance

label: Desecrator

label: Writing Desk
description: While the Guild is not exclusively a Beaver organization, almost every adult Beaver belongs to it. All trade routes are 5% faster for every villager living in a house with this upgrade.

label: Lichen
description: While Foxes are as mortal as any other species, there are no Fox graves to be found anywhere. Scouts work 2% faster on glade events for every villager living in a house with this upgrade.

label: Workbench

label: Drafting Table
description: Frogs are natural architects. They are said to have designed most of the Smoldering City. Building materials are produced 3% faster for each villager living in a house with this upgrade.

label: Atrium
description: Frogs form very tight-knit communities and highly value their social status. Each newcomer group has 1 additional villager for every 2 villagers living in a house with this upgrade.

label: Storage Room
description: 1 <sprite name="[packs] pack of building materials"> Pack of Building Materials

label: Canopy
description: In the final days of the Great Civil War, before peace was declared, there were no more than three hundred Harpies left alive. Each villager living in a house with this upgrade increases the production speed of recipes that use or make fabric by 5%.

label: Toolshed
description: The love of farming is perhaps the last thing that reminds Humans of their long-fallen kingdoms. Global planting and harvesting speeds are increased by +5% for every villager living in a house with this upgrade.

label: Cellar
description: Some say that if it weren't for the Queen's sudden appearance, the Lizard clans would've eventually beaten the other species in the Great Civil War. Global gathering speed is increased by +5% for every villager living in a house with this upgrade.

description: The Crown requires you to contribute to the Royal Treasury. At the end of each Drizzle season, you will be asked to pay 1 <sprite name="[valuable] amber"> Amber for every 3 villagers in your settlement. If you don't, 2 people will leave.

label: Shifting Paths
description: The road to the village is long and winding, so some newcomers need a bit of extra motivation. Pay 2 <sprite name="[packs] pack of crops"> Pack of Crops with each storm (multiplied by the number of years played). If you don't, the next newcomer group will arrive 50% slower.

label: Devastation
description: The storm in this region is extremely violent. Once this effect is activated, you'll have to pay 1 <sprite name="[packs] pack of building materials"> Pack of Building Materials (multiplied by the number of years). If you don't, 3 buildings in your settlement will become ruins.

label: Rotten Vapors

label: Converted Altar of Decay
description: <color=#D6E54A>Harmony.</color> Bloody sacrifices delight the evil presence. Forbidden rituals at the Altar of Decay reduce Hostility by 20 points every time a villager dies or leaves.

label: Termite Nest
description: <color=#D6E54A>Harmony.</color> A tall bone structure built by the Fishmen. It has been repurposed and now provides 5 <sprite name="[crafting] sea marrow"> Sea Marrow per minute. Counts as 16 decorations of its type.

label: Makeshift Extractor
description: <color=#8AAFFD>Aesthetics.</color> A curious piece of improvised technology. It extracts moisture from the soil around it and converts it into 10 <sprite name="[water] clearance water"> Clearance Water per minute.

label: Converted Harmony Spirit Altar
description: <color=#D6E54A>Harmony.</color> When your villagers' needs are met, Harmony is fostered. Each unique service building adds 2 to Global Resolve. Counts as 9 decorations of its type.

label: Obelisk
description: <color=#8AAFFD>Aesthetics.</color> The symbols carved into this monumental stone bear an eerie resemblance to the forest and corruption. Decreases Hostility by 10 points and increases the Ancient Hearth's resistance by 100.

label: Rainpunk Noria
description: <color=#49E058>Comfort.</color> The old machine has been improved with Rainpunk technology. Farm production becomes easier. Counts as 4 decorations of its type.

label: Converted Rain Totem
description: <color=#D6E54A>Harmony.</color> The ritual was completed, but a faint, rhythmic thumping can still be heard coming from the totem. Decreases Hostility by 50. Counts as 4 decorations of its type.

label: Converted Totem of Denial
description: <color=#D6E54A>Harmony.</color> Repurposed Fishmen magic can be very useful... but let's hope we don't suffer the same fate as the priestess Ysabelle. Increases Global Resolve by +3. Counts as 4 decorations of its type.

label: Tamed Stormbird
description: <color=#D6E54A>Harmony.</color> The nest of a tamed Stormbird. It provides 5 <sprite name="[food raw] eggs"> Eggs per minute and increases Harpy Resolve by +3.

label: Termite Nest
description: <color=#D6E54A>Harmony.</color> A contained stonetooth termite burrow. Provides 5 <sprite name="[food raw] insects"> Insects per minute. Counts as 4 decorations of its type.

label: Ghost Chest
description: The spirit will reward you for fulfilling its last wish. The contents of the chest are unknown.

label: Decay
description: A mysterious chest filled with treasure. It was left behind by a restless spirit as a token of appreciation.

label: Excavation
description: The first stage of the process. The ancient skeleton has to be unearthed.

label: Conservation
description: Archaeologists carefully excavate and conserve the skeleton.

label: Reconstruction
description: <color=#D6E54A>Harmony.</color> The reconstructed skeleton of an ancient species of scorpion. Increases Global Resolve for Reputation Points gained. Counts as 9 decorations of its type.
